# GKExchangeTimeoutNone

**Global Variable**

An exchange request timeout that doesn’t expire.

## Declaration

```swift
var GKExchangeTimeoutNone: TimeInterval
```

## Timeouts

- **GKExchangeTimeoutDefault**: A one-day exchange request timeout.
title: GKExchangeTimeoutNone
